page.title: 05POP STARS AND GROUPS
page.content: Some of the most popular music stars and groups are Paul MaCartney, The Flying Pickets, Michael Jackson, Duran Duran, Buck Fizz, King, Wham and Frankie goes to Hollywood. I like to dance to records from,Michael Jackson, Paul MaCartney, Duran Duran. Pop music is quite an industry. Besides records you can buy T shirts, badges, stickers, magazines, posters, autographs, head bands, arm bands and other cheap objects. Rock, reggae, heavy-metal, soul and pop are ace. I have a poster of Duran Duran, I haven't any badges but I have got a lot of stickers of pop groups and stars. I like to listen to The Flying Pickets. They are clever. They sing without any musical instruments. They sing different parts. I like the leader of them and the little one with curly hair and a hat.
